body:
I have seen a similar failure:

Serving /grpc.testing.TestService/EmptyCall
Serving /grpc.testing.TestService/UnaryCall
Serving /grpc.testing.TestService/StreamingOutputCall
Serving /grpc.testing.TestService/StreamingInputCall
Serving /grpc.testing.TestService/FullDuplexCall
Serving /grpc.testing.TestService/HalfDuplexCall
    ✓ should pass empty_unary (911ms)
    ✓ should pass large_unary (608ms)
    ✓ should pass client_streaming (484ms)
    1) should pass server_streaming
    ✓ should pass ping_pong (780ms)
    ✓ should pass empty_stream (710ms)
    ✓ should pass cancel_after_begin 
    ✓ should pass cancel_after_first_response (502ms)
